New Records: Trae Young drilled a game-winning half-court shot to secure the Hawks' victory over the Jazz.
Trae Young finished with 24 points on 6-for-16 shooting and 20 assists, showcasing his clutch performance.
Key Match Events: The game was tied at 121 with seconds left when Trae Young made the decisive shot.
Collin Sexton tied the game with a three-pointer before Young's clutch shot.
Post-Match Reflections: The Hawks' win moved them above.500 in a topsy-turvy season, highlighting their potential despite inconsistent performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game featured high emotional moments, especially for Jazz fans who celebrated and then were heartbroken.
The Hawks showed potential, especially during their NBA Cup run, despite variable results.
